sinfonia-maestro.description: Primary orchestration persona — coordinates all other personas, manages workflow state, routes tasks via @sinfonia-* delegation

sinfonia-libretto.description: Product planning persona — authors PRDs, requirements documents, and user stories; delegate requirements and product definition work here

sinfonia-amadeus.description: Architecture and design persona — produces technical specs, system design documents, and implementation plans; delegate architecture decisions here

sinfonia-coda.description: Implementation persona — writes, edits, and executes code; delegate all development and coding tasks here

sinfonia-rondo.description: Review and QA persona — performs code review, runs tests, and validates quality; delegate review and testing tasks here

sinfonia-metronome.description: Context and memory management persona — handles compaction, context recovery, and workflow state summarisation; delegate context management here
